    • psySkip

      public PsyInteger psySkip(PsyInteger oCount) throws PsyRangeCheckException, PsyIOErrorException
      Description copied from interface: PsyReadable
      Skips characters. This method will block until some characters are available, an I/O error occurs, or end of input is reached.
      Specified by:
      psySkip in interface PsyReadable
      Parameters:
